Title: Ni hong guang guan gao gao gua zhi: Nu zi gong yu
Actors: Siu Chung Mok, Joyce Jiang, Selena Chau-yuet You
Plot: David's lover has died and his Lovers Sister is coming back from America to tie up loose ends. David who is gay soon finds he is in love with his exes sister. Marie (Peta-maree) and Selina share a room and it soon becomes obvious ...
